page.title: 16CROFT GUIDES & BROWNIES.
page.content: Croft Brownies meet at Croft School at 6.00 p.m. every Thursday during school term time. We are called the 1st. Croft Brownies and our meetings last for an hour. There are twelve of us and we are divided into two groups which are called the elves and the sprites. Our leaders are called Brown Owl and Tawny Owl, and every year we have our Brownie Birthday, when we put an extra candle on the cake each time. We work at lots of different badges. The Guides meet at Croft School on Thursday nights after the Brownies' meeting is finished, from 7.30 p.m. until 9.00 p.m. There are nine Guides divided into two patrols _Swallows and Kingfishers. Each year the Guides go to camp. They have to raise money to be self-supporting and try to help the community.
